Containers.Name: Custom SMB Shares
Containers.Description:
Create and manage custom Samba/SMB shares independently from Unraid's built-in share system. Perfect for advanced users who need fine-grained control over SMB share configurations including custom permissions, macOS/Time Machine support, host restrictions, and more.
Features: - Create shares pointing to any path under /mnt/ - Full permission control (create/directory masks, force user/group) - macOS optimization with Fruit VFS and Time Machine support - Host allow/deny lists for access control - Security modes (Public, Secure, Private) - Enable/disable shares without deletion - Import/Export configurations - Automatic backup with retention
Containers.Overview: Create and manage custom Samba/SMB shares with advanced configuration options not available in Unraid's built-in share system.
